DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effectiveness endoscopic full-thickness plication ( Plicator ; NDO Surgical , Inc. , Mansfield , MA ) treatment GERD comparison sham procedure . Patients symptomatic GERD require maintenance proton pump inhibitor therapy enter randomize , single-blind , prospective , multicenter trial . Seventy-eight patient randomly assign undergo endoscopic full-thickness restructuring gastric cardia transmural suture . Eighty-one patient underwent sham procedure . Group assignments reveal follow 3-month evaluation . The primary endpoint ≥ 50 % improvement GERD-HRQL score . Secondary endpoint include medication use esophageal acid exposure . Patients achieve ≥ 50 % improvement GERD-HRQL score 3-months versus baseline off-meds consider responsive assigned procedure . Patients fail reach level improvement 3-months consider non-responders . Analysis dichotomize variable ( responder/non-responder ) do use Fisher 's exact test compare proportion responder active sham group . Intent-to-treat analysis also perform . The null hypothesis proportion responder active sham group . Testing do 5 % level significance ( alpha=0.05 ) .
